name: tanstack-table
description: Build headless data tables with TanStack Table v8. Provides server-side pagination, filtering, sorting, and virtualization patterns for Cloudflare Workers + D1 databases. Use when building tables with large datasets, coordinating with TanStack Query, or troubleshooting state management issues, pagination coordination errors, or performance bottlenecks. { accessorKey: name, header: Name }, { accessorKey: email, header: Email }, const data = useMemo(() => [...users], []) // Stable reference const
